entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:37 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 12:37 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
